Package com.hush.applet.security

Interface Summary
Badge A tagging interface, which identifies the type of privileges to be bestowed on an class.
 

Class Summary
BlackdownStrategy This is exactly the same as SunStrategy.
EmptyStrategy An implementation of the Strategy interface which enables code to be trusted in the JVM environment of Empty's VisualAge for Java.
MicrosoftStrategy An implementation of the Strategy interface which enables code to be trusted in the Microsoft JVM environment of Internet Explorer.
NetscapeStrategy An implementation of the Strategy interface which enables code to be trusted in the Netscape JVM environment of Netscape Navigator.
Strategy An interface to abstract and encapsulate the differing security environments provided by Microsoft, Netscape, and Sun; however, this framework is extensible to allow any other future security environment to be added.
SunStrategy An implementation of the Strategy interface which enables code to be trusted in the Java 2 Security Framework.
